Class Main

java.lang.Object
ib.grapher.Main
public final class Main extends Object
The main class of the grapher, in charge of managing other windows and storing constants.

    • WONG_COLORS

      public static final Color[] WONG_COLORS
      These are the colours that will be selected by default for the graph. They are specifically designed to be high contrast, including for colour-blind people. I don't expect that to be an issue with my client, but since I have to choose arbitrary colours anyways, I might as well choose the most accessible ones possible. Plus, I like the palette.

    • dataTable

      private static DataTable dataTable
      The data table being modified.

    • seriesSelectors

      private static final List<SeriesSelector> seriesSelectors
      A list of all the Series Selectors that need to be notified when a Series is added, deleted, or renamed.

  • Constructor Details

    • Main

      private Main()
      Sole constructor. Intended to appease Javadoc, not to be used.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Entrypoint to the graphing program. Initializes windows and the menu bar.
      Parameters:
      args - Unused args provided by the user when the app is launched from the command line.

    • updateAllComponents

      public static void updateAllComponents()
      Updates the dataTable, plottableTable, and graph.

    • seriesCopy

      public static void seriesCopy(Series r, Byte[] destination, int pos)
      Copies a series name into a byte array.
      Parameters:
      r - The series to copy the name of
      destination - The byte array
      pos - The position to copy the start of the series into

    • saveAllData

      public static void saveAllData()
      Saves all data to the project file.

    • saveMetadata

      public static void saveMetadata()
      Saves all metadata to the project file. Typically called after every major change to the project, simply because it's easier than trying to figure out exactly when it needs to be called.

    • stringToByteArray

      public static Byte[] stringToByteArray(String s, int size)
      Converts a string to an array of bytes the desired size.
      Parameters:
      s - The string to convert.
      size - The size of the byte list. Should be a multiple of 2. If the string is too long, extra characters are dropped. If the string is too short, it is padded with zeroes.
      Returns:
      The byte array.

    • whereAmI

      static void whereAmI()
      Debug method that prints the method that calls it and whether or not that method is running on the Event Dispatch Thread.

    • getImageAsset

      public static BufferedImage getImageAsset(String path)
      Loads an image asset from a path (typically within the JAR).
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the image resource
      Returns:
      The image, or null if no image is found
